name: Kodomo Kyouiku Terebi Wii: Aiue Ouchan
overview: (Google Translated from Japanese WiiWare page) Surrounded by television, parents and yo-yo! Learning software that can be enjoyed with playing playful feeling was born. Parent-child's rich conversation is born and nurtures intellectual curiosity and thinking power. In my room you can customize, there is always Ooo and speaks. 700 Wii points with a color-making game "Irozze Mixer" and a learning drill. Moreover, 29 paid additional contents can be chosen according to interest and age from six curriculums such as feeling, social, nature, words, number, wisdom that you want to acquire from early childhood to the first grade of elementary school (each 200 to 400 Wii points ). The level of game and drill changes with age, you can change the setting. Up to 3 siblings can be registered separately.
